name: Party Italian Wedding Soup
author: Chuck
summary: A large batch of traditional Italian Wedding soup. This soup offers plenty of meat, carbohydrates and veggies. Perfect with Italian bread. For the pasta, I use acini di pepe, but you could use any small shape you desire, like shells or orzo.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into chunks
directions: In a large pot over medium heat, combine the chicken broth, spinach, onions, carrots and celery
Mix well and allow to simmer
In a separate large bowl, combine the ground beef, bread crumbs and egg and mix well
Form mixture into 1/2 inch diameter meatballs and carefully drop them into the soup
Put chunks of chicken breast into the soup and reduce heat to low
Allow the soup to simmer for 1 hour
Add the pasta 30 minutes before serving and season with salt and pepper to taste
